title: WTS/WTT: T206 Larry Doyle PSA PR-FR 1 mk, Beautiful Color
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: WTS/WTT: T206 Larry Doyle PSA PR-FR 1 mk, Beautiful Color
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell this card grade PSA Pr/Fr 1 mk. Beautiful rich red background, crease across forehead,a couple pinholes right border.  Small purple "299" writing back. This card's eye appeal exceeds its technical grade. $22 +3 s/h = $25 dlvd. PM if itnerested. Might trade for a T205/T206 Pirates card.  

[url][IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/Doyle.jpg[/IMG][/url]
